snippet: George Karl, who coached and tried to reason with Carmelo Anthony for five and a half years in Denver, said he was pleased to see Anthony playing at such a high level.
lead_paragraph: George Karl, who coached and tried to reason with Carmelo Anthony for five and a half years in Denver, said he was pleased to see Anthony playing at such a high level.

headline.seo: Karl Praises Change in Carmelo Anthony’s Game
headline.main: Karl Praises Change in Anthony’s Game
headline.print_headline: Karl Praises Change in Anthony’s Game
